name: AXE7 :      "Fade To Black"
description: Ode to Metallica. I thought it might be nice to say hello to the guys in MetallicA. Thanks for all the great music. STORY : As you continue to Destroy the hell spawn, you run across this base. It seems Metallica, has been used as another Dimesnional gate. As you begin to explore this complex, you realise this could be your end ! Fade to Black ! In the Immortal word of Metallica, "Seek and Destroy." Don't forget ya Bible !!!!!!
